DOC.brief_title: Soy Isoflavones Breast Cancer Risk Reduction
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind study , two arm 100 woman arm . Premenopausal woman recruit randomly allocate take one two different dietary supplement pill daily 2 year . The two supplement soy isoflavones ( treatment ) placebo ( carbohydrate ) . Both treatment placebo pill contain multi-vitamins mineral . Multiple blood , urine , breast fluid sample obtain dietary supplement period analyze biomarkers breast cancer risk . At baseline intervention period , breast density bone density assess radiologic technique . The efficacy dietary intervention determine compare mean change serum marker breast cancer risk , dense breast tissue , bone mineral density two year dietary intervention period two supplement group adjustment baseline value individual patient characteristic interest . We predict 2 year soy isoflavone supplement reduce breast density , may explain individual change serum marker breast cancer risk .
